content.rendered:
Nordica is the state-owned Estonian flag carrier headquartered in Tallinn and based at Lennart Meri Tallinn Airport. The airline was formed after the 2015 bankruptcy of the previous flag carrier Estonian Air. Since all flights are marketed by LOT Polish Airlines – a member of the Star Alliance, Nordica also carries LOT’s flight codes and callsign. Through its subsidiary Regional Jet (which will be renamed to Nordica Regional), Nordica operates four ATR72-600s between Örebro and Groningen.

 

Nordica Airlines office in Tallinn, Estonia Contact Address, Phone, Working hours and Website

Address: Lennujaama tee 13, 11101 Tallinn, Estonia

Phone: +372 664 2200

Email: info@nordica.ee

Working hours: Mon, Wed – Fri
06:00 – 19:00
Tue, Sun
08:00 – 19:00
Sat
12:00 – 18:30

Nordica Airlines Official website: https://www.nordica.ee/en

Types of Planes / Air craft available with Nordica Airlines

Total fleet: 20

  • ATR 72-600
  • Bombardier CRJ700
  • Bombardier CRJ900

Nordica Airlines Baggage Allowance

View Nordica Airlines Hand | Cabin baggage, Checked baggage, Excess baggage charges, over weight baggage charges, over size baggage charges in the above link.

Special Assistance in Nordica Airlines

Traveling while Pregnant in Nordica Airlines

  • Up to the 32th week of pregnancy you can travel without any special certificates, although it is still a good idea to consult your doctor.
  • From the 33th week of pregnancy, you need a doctor’s certificate in order to travel by plane. The certificate, which must be issued no more than ten days before the date of travel, confirms that travelling will not harm your pregnancy.

For more details: https://www.nordica.ee/en/information/passengers-with-special-needs/travelling-when-pregnant/

Traveling with Pets in Nordica Airlines

  • Nordica Airlines allowed travel with a pet such as a cat, dog or ferret

For more details: https://www.nordica.ee/en/information/travelling-with-pets/

Queries handled by Nordica Airlines Customer care:

Schedule, eBooking, Rescheduling, Track and Trace, Charter Service Queries, Trucking service Queries, e-claims Flight Information, Missing Luggage, Delayed Flights. Pharma, pets, valuable, perishable goods and extra care shipment queries. Miles & More

Is there any problem / complaint with reaching the Nordica Airlines in Tallinn, Estonia Address or Phone number? Please report any issues using the below comment form.

Rate your experience with the Nordica Airlines in Tallinn, Estonia: (click on the stars below)
